Package gameworld

Class Room

java.lang.Object
gameworld.Room
public class Room extends Object
Version:
Last refactored on 12.06.2022.

Class representing different rooms, or segments, of the game world. Class instances are put into 2D array via the Map class and then accessed via getter from the Map class. Rooms as such hold different instances of different objects, which are interacted by in different manners by the player.

Author:
Martin Kadlec
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(String name, String description, boolean isLocked, Item roomLoot, Monster roomEnemy, RoomType roomBehavior)
      Standard Room constructor. Used by Map factory method.
      Parameters:
      name - String representing the titular name of the room, printed to the player
      description - String representing the description of the room, printed to the player as guidance and flavor text
      isLocked - boolean representing the accessibility of the room, if false, room cannot be entered.
      roomLoot - Reference to the Item class tied to the room, null if no item present.
      roomEnemy - Reference to the Monster class tied to the room, null if no enemy present.
      roomBehavior - ENUM representing the available interaction in the room.
      See Also:
      • Map.fillMap()
      • Monster
      • Item
      • TheKnight.moveKnight(Scanner)
